entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
